title: Yogi Organic Tea - Detox Energy
cleaned_text: With dandelion with sweet and bitter notes! Do you sometimes feel the urge to experience a moment of attention that only concerns you? Enjoying a cup of "YOGI® Detox Energy" with dandelion with sweet and bitter notes, nettle and sparkling lemon helps you "detoxify" from the influences to which you are exposed every day. Live this moment to appreciate yourself, your thoughts and your feelings. Bring these incredible herbs alive by infusing in freshly-boiled water for at least 5 organic
